title: [Bad]  Once you make a public posting eBay, you may not be able to change or remove it.

tosdr.case: [Bad]  Once you make a public posting eBay, you may not be able to change or remove it.-bad-undefined
tosdr.tldr: [Bad]  Once you make a public posting eBay, you may not be able to change or remove it.  But if you request to close your account, they will remove your personal information from view.
